attributes.action: Introduce drive-thru sections to UK supermarkets
attributes.additional_details: You’re a parent, out in the car and realise you have run out of baby formula, milk for your much needed coffee or just used the last nappy. Your children have finally fallen asleep after screaming at the top of their lungs for an hour and the thought of getting them out the car to grab the urgent items fills you with dread as you’ll have to start the nap process all over again… oh how a drive thru part of the supermarket would be a life saviour right now…!
attributes.background: Additional shopping option for parents with young children in the car or individuals with mobility issues to access a small number of urgent items via a drive thru after ordering via the supermarkets app

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
